channel.title: Muhammed Hajib Blog - AI/ML Student at MACE Kothamangalam
channel.description: Blog posts by Muhammed Hajib - BTech AI/ML student at MACE Kothamangalam, Kerala. Read about sleep, coding, machine learning, and productivity.

item.title: The Secret Relationship Between My Sleep Schedule and My Code (And Why My Laptop Is Jealous)
item.description: Muhammed Hajib shares the hilarious and insightful story of how his 8-hour sleep routine improved his coding, machine learning models, and productivity at MACE Kothamangalam.
item.author: Muhammed Hajib (hajib@example.com)
item.keywords: Muhammed Hajib, sleep coding, machine learning, productivity, MACE Kothamangalam
